Posts.Content: Sorry, primary suggestion was eat bananas.  One a day has worked for me. Maybe you could try Vita Coco?  I see it in most supermarkets these days.  It's coconut water from green coconuts.
Posts.Title: cramping a year after chemo / breast cancer

Posts.Content: I'm very sorry this has to be happening to you. I have not had this situation, but I implore you to please research the connection between iodine and both thyroid and breast cancer.  There is a lot of information out there.  There are web pages and youtubes on it.
Posts.Title: Possible Breast Cancer after Thyroid Cancer
